---
title: "Using reticulate's Python Engine with knitr"
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(reticulate)
knitr::knit_engines$set(python = eng_python)
```

```{python}
x = 1
y = 2
```

```{python}
print x
print y
```

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.plot([1, 2, 3, 4])
plt.show()
```
